Shaprclaws::

"Megatron wants all Power just for him" answered Sharpclaws "His 
ambition started all Predacon's civil war and if we don't stop it, he 
will destroy all Predacons... We wanted destroy other Predacons 
Leaders and rule their groups "

The Male added "When Maximals come back Cybertron, Megatron was his 
prisioner, all bots in Cybertron knew about the Beast wars and bots 
involved... Then other Predacons, with Megatron involved, came back 
and follow them, Maximals; the war started again and often new 
warriors come... Some of them are trying to help Maximals, others 
predacons, some times appear pods, and when that happen, factions 
started fight pods' possesion"
